types.description: Provides int packets on a timely manner (after each system clock hour changes)
types.name: wallclock/hour

out_ports.description: An int range packet when wallclock hour ticks.
out_ports.name: OUT

out_ports.description: An int range packet when wallclock minute ticks.
out_ports.name: OUT

out_ports.description: An int range packet when wallclock month day ticks.
out_ports.name: OUT

types.description: Provides int packets on a timely manner (after each system clock second changes)
types.name: wallclock/second

out_ports.description: An int range packet when wallclock second ticks.
out_ports.name: OUT

types.description: Provides int packets on a timely manner (after each system clock week day changes)
